name: My Light
description:
A very short game about love and the choices we face.

This is an experimental 5 minutes game that tells a story, your story. It's about love and the tough calls we make in it's name. I hope you enjoy playing it just as much as I enjoyed making it. =)

Music and Sound Credits:

Nothing(Bonus Track) by Kai Engel

Behind Your Window by Kai Engel

Prelude No. 14 by Chris Zabriskie

Now You Are Here by Sergey Cheremisinov
